# AnimationEvents.SkeletalPoseUpdateComplete

**Structure**

Raised immediately after the SkeletalPoseSystem has been updated.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SkeletalPoseUpdateComplete
```

## Instance Properties

- **deltaTime**: The elapsed time since the last update.
